resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105213</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105213</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202798</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">E-pal Adventure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abenteuer E-Kamerad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aventure E-pal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aventura E-E-pal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Avventura E-pal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιπέτεια ε-PAL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aventura E-amigacho</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will be paired with an e-pal they will hopefully meet during their 8th grade trip to the coast.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer werden mit einem Ekameraden 
zusammengepaßt, den sie hoffnungsvoll während ihrer 8. Gradreise zur
Küste treffen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des étudiants seront appareillés avec e-pal 
qu'ils rencontreront si tout va bien pendant leur 8ème voyage de 
catégorie à la côte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes serão emparelhados com um e-e-pal 
que se encontrarão com esperançosamente durante seu 8o desengate da 
classe à costa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi saranno accoppiati con e-pal che 
eventualmente verranno a contatto di durante il loro ottavo viaggio 
del grado al litorale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα ζευγαρωθούν με ένα ε-PAL που θα 
συναντηθούν ενδεχομένως κατά τη διάρκεια του 8ου ταξιδιού βαθμού
τους στην ακτή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Emparejarán a los estudiantes con un e-amigacho 
que esperanzadamente resolverán durante su 8vo viaje del grado a la 
costa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:HILDA HAMILTON
FN:HILDA HAMILTON
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202798</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105213</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/e-pal-adventure</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
